data.name: Ice Station Z - Punk Skin Pack
data.detailed_description:
Punk Skin Pack.

Death Clown mask.
Full of Stars goggles (animated).
Pure Punk jacket.
Grunge Graffiti backpack.
Ripped & Torn trousers.
